text:
HSSFWorkbook wb = new HSSFWorkbook(fs) fails with the following error:

Error org.apache.poi.hssf.record.RecordFormatException: Unable to construct record instance

When reading a workbook that contains a sheet that contains an embedded chart that contains a textbox linked to a worksheet cell
creator: laird.trimble@gmail.com
laird.trimble@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 22688
Test file to demonstrate the bug

Fixed in svn r703302.

Junits added. Major clean-up in TestTextObjectRecord
creator: josh@apache.org
